parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description:
The subscription duration. Valid values:

- If you set PricingCycle to **Month**, the valid values for this parameter are **1** to **9**.

- If you set PricingCycle to **Year**, the valid values for this parameter are **1** to **3**.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. Call the [GetLindormInstanceList](~~426069~~) operation to obtain the instance ID.

parameters.name: PricingCycle
parameters.description:
The billing cycle for the instance renewal. Valid values:

- **Month**: The instance is renewed by month.

- **Year**: The instance is renewed by year.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the instance is located. Call the [DescribeRegions](~~426062~~) operation to obtain the region ID.
